name: PLPS And ICF Generator
description: The PLPS (Patient-Level Prediction System) and ICF (Informed Consent Form) Generator application is a healthcare tool designed to enhance patient care and streamline documentation.

appStages.name: Document-Manager
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eClinical Study Protocol Repository Set Up\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html3",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Repository Name ",
      "description": "All documents will be stored in this repository",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "hideLabel": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "CSP",
      "truncateMultipleSpaces": true,
      "validate": {
        "required": true
      },
      "key": "textField1",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Document Uploader",
      "description": "Upload Synopsis PDF",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "1KB",
      "multiple": true,
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],

                  "pull": 0,

                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {
                  "components": [
                    {
                      "label": "Upload Documents",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-right rounded",
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "upload",
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "upload",
                      "input": true,

                    }
                  ],
                  "width": 6,

    {

    {

              "clearOnHide": false,
